page.title: 15HACKLINGE AREA GOVERNMENT
page.content: The area is administered by 3 tiers of local government. 4 Parish Councils include parts of the regions in their territories. 3 Councillors are elected to Dover District Council and 1 County Councillor is elected to Kent at Maid- stone. All these representatives are glad to give their help when asked. Parish Councils bear the responsib- ility of looking after the interest of people in their immediate environs. District Councils administer local services and collect the rates for the County Council to provide education, roads, police, libraries, the fire service and social services. Part of the area is in South Thanet Parliamentary Constituency and part in Dover Constituency. Both send Conservative MPs to Westminster at present.
